column2: "Ana akodzi bi nnyi hɔ mma dasanyi wɔ asaase do? Na ne nda nntse dɛ paanyi nda bi a?"
"Dɛ mbrɛ akowaa hwehwɛ nwinwin enyiberdo
column3: Na dɛ mbrɛ paanyi hwɛ n’apaabɔdze kwan no:"

column2: "Dɛmara so na wɔama menya abosoom gyangyan
column3: Na wɔahyehyɛ berɛ anadwe dze ama me."

column2: "Sɛ mekɛda hɔ a
column4: Aber bɛn na mobɔsoɛr? Na adzesaa mu atwe; Na adafatwitwa fon me dze kodu enyimtsetsewee."

column2: "Mo honam fura mbowaba na dɛtse atɔwatɔw; Mo wer twintwam na otuetue fofor."
"Me nda ho yɛ har sen ɔwemfo n’akrokroba
column3: Na ɔhwer dɛ enyidado bi nnyi ho."

column2: "Ao
column3: kaa dɛ mo nkwa yɛ mframa: M’enyiwa runnhu papa bio."

column2: "Nyia ohu me n’enyiwa ronnhwɛ me bio: W’enyiwa bɛba mo do no
"Dɛ mbrɛ mununkum sa na ɔhera no
column3: Dɛmara so na nyia osian kɔ samanadze rommfow mmba bio."

column2: "Ɔrennsan mmba ne fie bio
column3: Nkyii so wonnkohu no bio wɔ ne tsenabew."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi merennka m’ano nnto mu
column3: Mebɛkasa wɔ mo sunsum n’ahoguan mu;"

column2: "Ana meyɛ po
column4: Ma ɔwo edze aweɔmfo sisi mo do yi?"

column2: "Sɛ mese dɛ
column4: M’adae bɔdwedwe mo nkɔmbɔdzi no a;"

column2: "Nna ɔwo edze adaaso riyi me hu. Na enam enyido adzehu mu robɔ me piriw:"
"Ma me kra pɛ menebabɔ
column3: Na wu mbom sen me mbiew."

column2: "Mo nkwa afon me; memmpɛ dɛ metsena ase daa; Gyaa me; na me nda yɛ egyangyandze."
"Dasanyi nye woana na ɔwo ihuhor no
column3: Na ɔwo edze w’akoma si no do
column6: Na esɔ no hwɛ aber nyinara?"

column2: "Ɔwo rinnyi w’enyi mmfi mo do araa ma ekodu dabɛn
column3: Na eso irinngyaa me araa ma ekodu dɛ mamen me ntafi?"

column2: "Sɛ mayɛ bɔn a
column4: ɔwo nyimpa weɔmfo? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na edze me esi hɔ dɛ wo botae
column5: Ma mayɛ adzesoa ama moho yi?"

column2: "Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na emmfa me mbrato nnkyɛ
column3: na innyi m’emumuyɛ nnkɔ? Na afei mebɛda huntuma mu; Na ɔwo bɔhwehwɛ me enyiberdo
